mi::shader_v3::Access_fb

const Framebuffer * operator-> () const
 reference the Framebuffer class, read-only access

Detailed Description

Smart pointer to access Framebuffer class, no editing.

There resources are released automatically when Access_fb goes out of scope. For editing operations use Edit_fb.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

smart pointer for the Framebuffer tag, read-only access.

Framebuffer access wrapper class.
